Posts.Content: Runnergirl29 wrote: Im new to this site, but I'm currently 20 years old and about 6 months ago I went to my OBGYN because I felt a lump in my left breast. She told me to come back and I did a few months later and since it was still there she recommended me for a sonogram . I got one and they said they found a mass most likely a fibroadenoma but recommended a biopsy to be sure . My doctor then sent me for another opinion at a specialty breast center, who then biopsyed it and the doctor said he's almost certain it's a fibroadenoma but recommended a biopsy to be completely sure. He said it had many characteristics of being beign but the one side looked a little darker so he just wants to be sure . He told me multible times not to worry and that it'll be okay! They rated it a 4A I got a biopsy and the results should come back in a few days im just really nervous and worrying. can anyone share similar stories that it turned out being benign ? thanks in advance ! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Im hoping for a fibroadenoma! Runnergirl29 Ariom

Posts.Content: Runnergirl29 wrote: Hi everyone, I was just wondering had anyone had experience being a teenager or in their young 20s getting a lump biopsied? And what were the results ? I am currently 20 and my doctor believes it is benign Fibroadenoma but just wanted to be compleatly sure . Is this normal ? Im just worrying and I want to see if anyone else has gone through this ! Thanks Log in to post a reply
